definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: Xinxi girls such as the aptly used to describe the extreme, particularly in the examination.
sentences.chinese: 心细如发用来形容女生贴切至极，尤其在考试中。

sentences.english: And the topography is very appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 与此处地形地貌非常贴切。

sentences.english: I don’t think anyone could say it any better than that.
sentences.chinese: 我想没有哪句比这句更加贴切了。

sentences.english: Aneurism is as good a word as any other.
sentences.chinese: 动脉瘤可是一个最贴切的词了。

sentences.english: It is a most suitable word to be used to describe Princess Wencheng.
sentences.chinese: 这个词用在文成公主的身上再贴切不过了。

sentences.english: Well-chosen analogies and metaphors can also help.
sentences.chinese: 贴切的类比和比喻也会有较好的效果。

sentences.english: The apt citations and poetic gems have adorned his speeches.
sentences.chinese: 贴切的引语和珠玑般的诗句为他的演说词增添文采。

sentences.english: I think this term is apt.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这个词挺贴切的。

sentences.english: B: A turtle hiding in her shell is more like it.
sentences.chinese: 说她是缩头乌龟还更贴切。

sentences.english: The apt citations and poetic gems have adorned his speeches .
sentences.chinese: 贴切的引语和珠玑般的诗句为他的演说词增添文采。

sentences.english: A very accurate title for the vehicle having so fantastic design.
sentences.chinese: 这个车真是既拥有美妙的设计也有贴切的称呼。

sentences.english: THERE’S SOMETHING peculiarly apt about the fact that the current European crisis began in Greece.
sentences.chinese: 当前的欧洲危机开始于希腊，尤其贴切。

sentences.english: For the future in terms of interior design, eco-design seems more appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 对于未来的室内设计来讲，似乎生态设计更为贴切。

sentences.english: I can't find suitable words to express what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 我找不到贴切的词来表达我的意思。

sentences.english: Some sentences yet feel not translated appropriately , thanks for your correction.
sentences.chinese: 有一些句子总觉得译得不够贴切，请明眼人多指点。

definition: word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
to make a pun/to have a double meaning/double entendre
to compare/to liken to/metaphor/analogy/figure of speech/figuratively
to act cleverly to get what one desires/to get the best at least expense
